item.description:
Manchester Music Festival (outdoors)
Friday Sept 7

6:00 PM
Related Link:
http://www.manchestermusicfestival.com

BUY TICKETS NOW ONLINE   or call the Palace Theater at 669-5588

We'll announce a meeting place later

The Manchester Music Festival is an outdoor/indoor music festival presented by Autofair and Manchester Harley Davidson to benefit the Historic Palace Theatre. The festival will be outside on Hanover street in downtown Manchester outside of The Palace and also will feature a performance inside the theatre each evening. All proceeds from the 2012 festival go to benefit the Historic Palace Theatre.

We have a variety of ticketing options to fit each music lover's needs - you have the option to just enjoy the outdoor stages (only $10/day!), catch our bands inside the Palace or see it all with our VIP package! This first year of the music festival will feature a variety of musical genres that will satisfy all music lovers! We will feature acts such as: Farren Butcher, Inc, James Montgomery and Friends, Jon Poussete-Dart ,The FOOLS and more entertaining outdoors beginning early evening, we will end each night inside the Palace Theatre with popular bands like Orleans ("Still the One" and "Dance with Me") and Little Texas ("What Might Have Been" and "God Bless Texas"). Don't miss this inaugural event that will be sure to have audiences wanting more! We will be closing down Hanover street for a night of fun music, great local food and fun in downtown Manchester!
Ticket Information: $10 (street admission) $25 (street and inside concert admission), $50 VIP (includes outside and inside shows as well as pre-show meet and greet and premium seating outside and inside

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: LISTEN TO SOME GREAT MUSIC
